metadata.Title: CVE-2020-18442 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - low.
metadata.Description:
Infinite Loop in zziplib v0.13.69 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service via the return value "zzip_file_read" in the function "unzzip_cat_file".

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-18442` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libzzip-0-13 - 0.13.72+dfsg.1-1.1
zziplib-bin - 0.13.72+dfsg.1-1.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: zziplib package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.13.72+dfsg.1-1.1').
